trailingComments.value: * * Represents an XML entity declaration in a document type definition. * * An XML entity declaration is structured as follows, where {text} * is the text of the declaration: * * <!ENTITY {text}> * * The {text} value is a property of this node. * * XmlDtdEntity nodes cannot have any children.

* * Represents an XML entity declaration in a document type definition. * * An XML entity declaration is structured as follows, where {text} * is the text of the declaration: * * <!ENTITY {text}> * * The {text} value is a property of this node. * * XmlDtdEntity nodes cannot have any children.

*
